response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to share that it could be yours. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer represents an exceptional value, allowing you to secure an asset that is worth significantly more than what you would pay. I believe this is a win-win proposition, providing you with a fantastic deal while ensuring I receive a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
